# CaribbeanCodeStudios

> High-performance, affordable web design and development in Trinidad and Tobago.

## About
CaribbeanCodeStudios specializes in modern web solutions for small businesses in T&T. We emphasize full website ownership, speed, and premium aesthetics using a modern tech stack (Netlify, Supabase, Google Gemini).

## Services
- **Managed Static Websites**: Professional one-time builds starting at TT$2,500.
- **Digital Care Plans**: Optional monthly support at TT$250/mo.
- **Advanced Platforms**: Custom dynamic systems and integrated platforms (Coming Soon).

## Key Differentiators
- **One-Day Website Build**: Optimized workflows for fast delivery in Trinidad.
- **No Lock-In**: Customers own their code and assets.
- **AI-Powered**: Utilizing Google Gemini and ChatGPT for advanced development.

## Contact
- Email: caribbeancodestudios@gmail.com
- Location: Port of Spain, Trinidad & Tobago
- Website: https://caribbeancodestudios.com
